headline: These Financial Leaders' Stocks Look Firm Ahead Of Fed Announcement
summary: Many major bank stocks are trading near record highs and in some cases near buy points, as the Fed ponders an interest-rate cut that's likely to influence rate-sensitive financials.  The Federal Reserve is meeting to decide whether to resume cutting interest rates.  The Fed started loosening monetary policy a year ago, but so far hasn't changed the target Fed funds rate at all this year.

headline: Record Number of Fund Managers Say Stocks Are Overvalued, Survey Finds
summary: The net share of fund managers who say they are overweight stocks doubles from August, according to Bank of America’s monthly poll.

headline: BofA Ranked No. 1 Small Business Lender for 17th Consecutive Quarter
summary: Bank of America today announced that the company has been ranked the number one small business lender across the U.S. for the 17th consecutive quarter, according to the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC). The FDIC publishes quarterly data on U.S.-based business loan balances for original loan amounts up to $1 million. Based on which, Bank of America has maintained this industry leadership position for more than 4 years (Q2 2021 through Q2 2025), with total small business loan balances

headline: Is Robinhood Still Worth the Hype After Massive 2025 Rally and New BofA Price Target?
summary: So, you’re standing at the edge of a decision: hold on to your Robinhood Markets stock, grab more, or take some profits off the table? You’re not alone. This is one of the most talked-about names in fintech, and for good reason. Over the last year alone, Robinhood’s share price has soared a jaw-dropping 417.0%, and so far in 2025, the stock boasts an astonishing 191.2% gain year to date. Sure, the last week was down by 2.1%, but zoom out and the growth story becomes clear. A 1019.2% return in...

headline: Leadership Overhaul and Co-President Structure Could Be a Game Changer for Bank of America (BAC)
summary: On September 12, 2025, Bank of America announced senior leadership changes, naming Dean Athanasia and Jim DeMare as Co-Presidents, and appointing Alastair Borthwick as Executive Vice President to further enhance its global capabilities and focus on long-term growth. This leadership transition signals a sharpened focus on accelerating digital innovation, operational excellence, and strengthening business lines across all client segments under experienced leadership. Now, we'll examine how...

headline: BofA’s Hartnett Sees Stock Rally Extending as Growth Bets Surge
summary: The bank’s latest survey showed a net 28% of global fund managers are overweight equities, the highest in seven months.  Opinions about growth showed the sharpest improvement in almost a year, Hartnett said, with only a net 16% of investors now expecting the economy to weaken.
